channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Bar-Ilan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Differentially Private Equivalence Testing for Continuous Distributions and Applications
item.description: First differentially private algorithm for testing equivalence between continuous distributions, enabling privacy-preserving comparisons of sensitive data.

item.title: Plant-and-Steal: Truthful Fair Allocations via Predictions
item.description: Learning-augmented mechanisms for fair allocation achieve constant-factor approximation with accurate predictions and near-optimal approximation even with inaccurate ones.
